General.Name: Pucara Gold Ltd
General.Description: Pucara Gold Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of precious and base metal properties in Peru. It explores for gold, copper, zinc, lead, and silver deposits. The company's project portfolio includes the Pacaska, Keyla, Lourdes, Los Tambos, Paco Orco, Santo Tomas, and Capricho in Peru. Pucara Gold Ltd. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 650 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N9
